attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: This app just gave my phone so many glitches and is terrible.

attributes.title: this app made me wanna die😠😠
attributes.review: this was such a horrible app. as soon as i opened the app i saw trump, and i went blind. now i can’t ever have a normal life. i can’t drive, i can’t ride a bike, i can’t do anything a normal person can do all because of this app. so please consider the consequences before downloading.

attributes.title: do not under any circumstances download
attributes.review: upon opening said app i was “greeted” by very very very cynical images of things that i refuse to repeat because of course they were so cynical and vile but then as i browsed around, it kept talking about something upon the matter of “trump”?!? whatever that is😤😤😤😤😤 newaiz acab/ blm🤗🤗🤗🤗

attributes.title: orange cheeto🎉😳
attributes.review: when i downloaded the app there were cockroaches coming out of my phone and they were screaming trump 2020 with a TRUMP FLAG oh to see without my eyes💅✨😳

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: this app is super glitchy. it took 30 mins to load and once it loaded it crashed. it won’t let me start it at all. also when i did try to start the app my phone alerted that it gave my phone viruses and i have to delete it now.

attributes.title: terrible app

This app is ridiculous! Came to support, ended 
up frustrated since it’s so glitchy and programmed badly.

attributes.title: SO BAD!!
